name: Penelope Remake
description:
WARNING: This game is meant to be  merely a joke, so it's not really meant to be taken seriously as well, this is also a remake of the original penelope from the finobe site

Press esc to close game

V1 2/7/19: First Game Release

V2 2/17/19: The raymonfs no longer go above the gun as the gun sprite is now a background

V3 2/18/19: No longer draws the border like in the original penelope and a new score gui

Glitches: Raymonfs go above the gun sprite (FIXED) Raymonfs stop spawning sometimes (MAYBE FIXED)
